thread.section_title: The/Studio Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The/Studio | thestudio.com
thread.title: Kathleen Sheehan Wilmes
thread.title_full: The/Studio reviewed by Kathleen Sheehan Wilmes

author: Kathleen Sheehan Wilmes
title: Kathleen Sheehan Wilmes
text:
Patch received had a stain!!
Product received was wrong material, wrong color, and had a stain! Talked me into a store credit instead of a refund and then quadrupled the price (much cheaper locally). Stated that since I agreed to a store credit, a refund was no longer an option.
Terrible service.
